name: Bardo (itch) (annadohy)
description:
You are a cat, locked in the box of a mad scientist. Embrace your superpower of being both dead and alive! As a live cat, you can hunt and eat mice.

As a dead cat, you are unstoppable.

Unless your past catches up with you...

Press Space to switch between Live Cat and Ghost Cat. Eat all the mice, but be aware of the revengeful spirits of those you killed!

This game is part of GGL2022. We did all this in 48 hours!

Creators:

  • Lorena Weder - code, game desin
  • Josh Bryan - game design, level design, QA tester
  • Francisco Arrigoni - sound, code
  • Nick Philipse - game design, art
  • Anna Dohy - game design, level design, art
